data.event: The new venture, Billy's Soho's @ Southridge, opened about two weeks ago.

event.title: one day, one step at a time, and make

data.event: We want to take it one day, one step at a time, and make sure our feet are firmly planted on the ground."

event.title: worked there before are in there now

data.event: The restaurant is open from 4 p.m. to 10 p.m. Monday through Friday, noon to 10 p.m. Saturday; and noon to 9 p.m. Sunday. "Absolutely great people who worked there before are in there now helping me," Sohovich said.
